DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this open-label, randomized, two-period, two-treatment (single doses of 10 mg SHR0302 fasted or fed), crossover study was to evaluate the effect of a high-fat meal on the pharmacokinetics of SHR0302 and mass balance study in 14 healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of a High-fat Meal on the Pharmacokinetics of SHR0302 and Mass Balance Study in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male BMI:1924 kg/m2, weight > 50 kg. Age:1845 History of clinically significant laboratory results or disease. History of alcohol or drug abuse.
